title: Execute a Foreign Exchange (FX) Spot Trade
description: A corporate treasury needs to convert 1 million EUR to USD to fund US operations.

tasks.description: Get a real-time quote for the EUR/USD exchange rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the current spot rate from the FX trading platform.

tasks.description: Execute the spot trade for 1 million EUR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully executes the trade at the quoted rate.

tasks.description: Confirm the trade details and the expected settlement date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a trade confirmation, including the USD amount and settlement date (T+2).
